# 𒍍 ERIM6

𒍍 ᵇuru₂ बाढ़ bāṛh baha "flood" 𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅌 Bach 𓅤 बाढ़ bāṛh "flood" 𒍍 ᵇuru₂ 𒌸 ᵇuru₁₈ 𒋽 uru₅ ᵇuru •buru ( 𒌓 BIR₂ 𒀀·𒌷 bu₄uru ) बाढ़ bāṛh "flood"

𒍍 •buru •puru 𓉐

𒍍 room (uru₂tum) 𒍍 store-area (𒌓𒌷 star.uru)

𒌿 URU × GAR ERIM3 room , storeroom
𒍍 URU × UD ERIM6 room, storeroom
𒃫 GÁ × UD ERIM4 room, storeroom

𒀕 erim5 "storeroom"

𒂟 ERIM
